extension.summary: Script to toggle the power of an LG TV
extension.description: Script to toggle the power of an LG TV. This uses CEC to turn the TV on, and the Kodi.Script.TurnOffLGTV addon to turn it off.
extension.disclaimer: This requires the cec-client command to be installed, which is part of the cec-util debian package.
